message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. To make this a smooth transaction, I'm offering it at $20,000.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but I believe the value this product brings justifies a higher price. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $17,500?

Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I place on the product, I am comfortable with paying up to $16,000 for it. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
